mapper.insert: insert into raffle_activity_account_day (user_id, activity_id,day, day_count, day_count_surplus, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{day}, #{dayCount}, #{dayCountSurplus}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update raffle_activity_account_day set update_time = now(), day_count_surplus = day_count_surplus - 1 where activity_id = #{activityId} and user_id = #{userId} and day = #{day} and day_count_surplus > 0
